Entry.HWD: 10/1/2/Present Perfect (I, you, we, they) with been

GapFillInput.Title: Present Perfect (I, you, we, they) with been
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
A: Have you everbeen to England?
B: No, I haven't|have not. But I have|'vebeen to Scotland. It was lovely.
A: Haveyou ever been to Canada?
B: Yes, I have. It was beautiful. What about you? Have you beento lots of countries?
A: No, I've neverbeen to Canada or England, and Ihaven't|have notbeen to Scotland. But I have|'vebeen to America.
B: Really?
A: Yes, I wentthere last August.
